mapper.select: select * from product_info as a left join product_file as b on a.mk_product_id = b.pf_product_id where a.mk_product_type = 1 order by a.mk_register_date desc limit 3;

select * from product_info as a left join product_file as b on a.mk_idx = b.pf_product_id where a.mk_product_type = 2 or a.mk_product_discount_rate is not null order by a.mk_register_date desc limit 3;
select * from product_info as a left join product_file as b on a.mk_product_id = b.pf_product_id where a.mk_product_type = 2 order by a.mk_register_date desc limit 3;
